summary: Hello everyone, sorry for my imperfect English but I'm Italian. This is my first mod that includes a follower. Hope you like it let me know.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][color=#ff0000]DESCRIPTION[/color][/size]             
 Hello everyone, sorry for my imperfect English but I'm Italian. This is my first mod that includes a 
 New Follower,Azariel the  sorcerer . He can be found in  Windpeak Inn in Dawnstar.
 He is  a sorcerer who uses spells of destruction and evocation.
                                                   




   [color=#0000ff][size=6]LITTLE HISTORY[/size][/color]

After Mehrunes Dagon unleashed the oblivion of Tamriel and was defeated by Martin Septim the followers of the cult of the Mythic Dawn were hunted and killed. Among the few survivors of the cult was the most devoted to Mehrunes or Azariel a ruthless sorcerer who had given his soul to Mehrunes in exchange for a huge power .Azariel now has only one purpose ... Recreate the cult of the Mythic Dawn and bring the destruction of Tamriel. Some people claim to have seen Azariel at Dawstar while waiting for a champion to help him in his revenge.
                       


 [color=#00ff00]COMPATIBLE WITH UFO[/color]



[color=#ff0000]INSTALLATION[/color]

 Extract files to skyrim data folder
author: Derby1993
